name: LOOPSTER
description:
Loopster is a short game for the Ludum Dare 47 game jam, made in less than 24hrs.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

READ THIS BEFORE PLAYING:

The goal is to free all of the people with looping animations, by following the "Loopster" thru the portals and collecting the auras he drops. Once all of them are collected, the game ends. 

HOLD SHIFT TO SPRINT

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
